title: AFL star Adam Saad weds his wife in a backyard celebration
text:
AFL star Adam Saad has married his wife Salam Mahmoud in a family-filled backyard celebration surrounded by drummers that spilled onto the streets of Melbourne.

The 25-year-old Essendon player looked very much in love on Saturday wearing a velvet blue suit and bow tie as he stood beside his beautiful bride.

The couple danced to traditional music and stood under an arbour that connected to a back veranda, with gold chairs laid out for guests to sit on.

AFL star Adam Saad has tied the knot with his wife Salam Mahmoud in a family-filled backyard celebration surrounded by drummers that spilled onto the streets of Melbourne

The 25-year-old Essendon player looked very much in love on Saturday wearing a velvet blue suit and bow tie as he stood beside his beautiful bride

Those guests included Bombers captain Dyson Heppell, West Coast Eagle Keegan Brooksby and his girlfriend and AFLW star Abbey Holmes.

Ms Holmes took to Instagram to congratulate the gorgeous duo saying it was a 'privilege to be part of their super special day'.

In social media pictures uploaded by their friends Salam can be seen wearing a stunning and form-fitting white lace dress with a floor-length veil.

In social media pictures uploaded by their friends Salam can be seen wearing a stunning and form-fitting white lace dress with a floor-length veil

While Adam's main social media accounts are on private he will likely post more images after the exciting weekend is over

She was picked up by her new husband Adam during their first dance before they began to waltz around the garden surrounded by cheering family members.

A videographer on the day captured Salam getting out of a vintage convertible surrounded by motorbikes to make her highly anticipated entrance to the reception.

Adam played for the Gold Coast Suns from 2015 to 2017 before being traded to Essendon at the end of the 2017 season.

Guests included Essendon captain Dyson Heppell, West Coast Eagle Keegan Brooksby (left) and his girlfriend and AFLW girlfriend Abbey Holmes (right)

A videographer on the day captured Salam getting out of a vintage convertible surrounded by motorbikes to make her highly anticipated entrance to the reception

The dashing half-back is known for his outrageous speed and ability to tear through the sides of the field to execute perfect kicks.

He is one of two practising Muslims currently playing in the AFL, alongside Bachar Houli.

While Adam's main social media accounts are on private he will likely post more images after the exciting weekend is over.
description: AFL star Adam Saad has tied the knot with his wife Salam Mahmoud in a family-filled backyard celebration surrounded by drummers that spilled onto the streets of Melbourne.
authors: Matilda Rudd For Daily Mail Australia
